short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows the if there is dry weather ahead for Jeeping with the top down and the current temperature.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shows the chance of rain and predicted temperatures over the next hour, next 48 hours, and next 7 days to help you decide if you want the top down on your Jeep.

Also shows the current temperature on the extension's icon.
